string-array.name: steps_paper_airplane
string-array.item: How to fold a paper airplane
Place on desk in portrait orientation.
Fold the top-right corner half way across the paper from right to left.
Fold the top-left corner half way across the paper from left to right.
Fold the middle-right corner half way across the paper from right to left.
Fold the middle-left corner half way across the paper from left to right.
Fold the whole paper in half with the flaps on the inside.
Fold the outer-left flap back at a 90\u00B0 angle to create the left wing.
Fold the outer-right flap back at a 90\u00B0 angle to create the right wing.

string-array.name: steps_stand_on_one_foot
string-array.item: How to stand on one foot
Stand in place on both feet.
Lift one foot into the air.
